overview: Joe Barring is a motorcycle-riding, beer-drinking womanizer who takes odd jobs and still lives with his parents. Following an arrest, he gets a rude awakening when he learns that he is the father of at least one of three children whose mother has recently died, and that he is now their legal guardian.
tagline: Can an irresponsible, good for nothing drifter accept parenthood? Heck yeah!
title: My Bad Dad
